reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan stylish, with one noting it looks like a designer-made piece, and appreciate its perfect fit and true-to-size measurements. They describe it as well-made, comfortable, and soft, with one mentioning it has a medium weight. Customers like the colors, and one notes it's suitable for professional wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 stars - Excellent Quality and 2XL Fit - Highly Recommend!
items.body: I’m 5’4” and 220 lbs, and I purchased this Belle Poque Cardigan Tweed Sweater/Blazer in 2XL (gray and white tweed). I am absolutely thrilled with this purchase! The quality is beautiful, and the tweed pattern is stylish and sophisticated. I was particularly concerned about my arms, but this cardigan fits perfectly with plenty of space to move comfortably. The overall fit is flattering and well-constructed. For the price point, this piece is worth every penny. It looks far more expensive than it is. I encourage plus-size women to consider this cardigan… It’s a beautiful, confidence boosting piece that delivers on both style and comfort. I was not paid to write this review. Read more
items.author: MRC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size and photo
items.body: Beautiful sweater jacket and it is true to size. I purchased size small and it fit perfectly. The buttons on the sleeves make the look. I liked the buttons did not look cheap. I paired pearl and gold earrings and it looked very nice. Very pleased with the purchase. Read more
items.author: Sunflower

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Great quality, beautiful cardigan Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but snags easily
items.body: For the money especially this is a great "designer look" / "lady jacket" cardigan that can be worn with a skirt, pants, jeans, or over a dress to upscale your look a bit. It adds a layer of warmth and the knit is soft, so it is comfortable to wear. I did have to reinforce the thread on several of the "higher use" buttons, which are attractive by the way. I have not washed it yet, but plan to hand wash in Woolite for Darks in cool water, and dry flat. It does snag easily, and I have had to pull some snags back through the knit to the inside to keep them from view. The black braid also could have been better done in my view, as it seems a bit saggy and loose for the overall look of this cardigan, but for the money this is a good addition to my winter wardrobe. It looked great with a black ribbed turtleneck, black dress trousers and black boots for a memorial service I recently attended, and I got several compliments on my outfit later. I could have chosen the next size down and been fine, but I prefer my cardigans on the looser side so that they can be worn over heavier weight sweaters if needed. Read more
items.author: FlyGirl541

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater jacket, with attention to details.
items.body: Beautiful jacket! True to size, perfect fit. I was concerned whether the white threads would line up at the button closing because in one of the pictures it didn't, but they line up beautifully. They also line up at the side seams and on the pockets. That's important to me. This is a very pretty jacket at a great price. Read more
items.author: Rjean

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: The sweater is beautiful. It fits perfectly and I get so many compliments on it. Read more
items.author: J. H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get all the colors!
items.body: Well made, soft and true to size. It’s not an exact dupe of that famous French female designer but a pretty cool piece and nice with jeans or dressed up. I bought two, one in green and one in black. Love them! Read more
items.author: middleofnowhere

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and comforting
items.body: Beautifully made and comfortable Read more
items.author: Richard Rawson

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, White and Black, Pink, Beige, Black, Navy Blue, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
